replies.msg:
The Cancelo-Danilo is a done deal between Manchester City and Juventus.

City will pay €35m, while Cancelo will sign a contract until 2024 at €4.5m per season + bonuses. Danilo will earn €3.5m per season at Juve.

[via @NicoSchira]

https://www.skysports.com/football/news/11667/11777655/manchester-united-to-end-interest-in-paulo-dybala-over-player-demands

å””ä¿‚å’å¥½ç¬‘å•Š
æœ‰å†‡çŒç‹—ç‡™å’—Dybalaæ³¢è¡«

BREAKING NEWS

Manchester City are closing in on a deal to sign Joao Cancelo from Juventus, which would see Danilo moving in the opposite direction, according to Sky sources.

Negotiations have so far been positive, and we understand talks will continue today.

Danilo’s representatives met with officials at Juventus on Friday to agree personal terms.

Sky in Italy are telling us that City will pay around £27.5m for Cancelo in addition to the swap with Danilo.

Ilkay Gundogan has ended the uncertainty over his future by agreeing a new long-term deal at Manchester City.

Gundogan is set to sign an extension that is expected to tie him to the club for at least another three years beyond next summer.

City are set to confirm his stay within the next few weeks. (MEN)

Leroy Sane has told his representatives that he wants to return to the Bundesliga.

Manchester City’s stance is clear, he can leave if Bayern pays the €150m transfer fee. He is not for sale for €100m. (SPORT)

SANE DETERMINED TO LEAVE CITY
Leroy Sane is determined to leave Manchester City for Bayern Munich, according to Kicker.
The report suggests Sane has no intention of extending his contract with the Premier League champions, which expires in the summer of 2021, with the Premier League champions.
Meanwhile, Bayern may sign two Sanes this summer with the Bundesliga champions interested in the City winger's younger brother Sidi, who currently plays for Schalke's youth side, reports Kicker.

replies.msg:
Leroy Sane’s injury is worse than previously thought, and may even need an operation.

There’ll be a further investigation tomorrow, and the potential operation is said to be why City have kept quiet about the situation.

Sane could go under the knife and ‘be out for months’. This wouldn’t completely rule out a move to Bayern, with there being a possibility he could make the move and recover in Germany. (SPORT)

replies.msg: Aymeric Laporte is fit and 100% available ahead of Manchester City's Premier League opener against West Ham on Saturday. [El Chiringuito TV]

Manchester City FC can confirm that Leroy Sane has damaged the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee.

The flying winger picked up an injury in the opening stages of City’s Community Shield triumph over Liverpool at Wembley Stadium.
He has undergone testing throughout the week, with a specialist doctor travelling to Manchester for further examinations to understand the extent of the injury.
Leroy will have surgery in the coming week. Manchester City will provide Leroy with all the support and guidance he needs, and everyone connected with the Club wishes him a quick and full recovery.

He has undergone testing throughout the week, with a specialist doctor travelling to Manchester for further examinations to understand the extent of the injury.
